participant_1.background:
I've never been arrested, but I would love to travel the world and play music like my brother.
I am known for my talents and my love of my family.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.
i just bought a new house with my partner.
I prefer to explore new places with my sister.

participant_2.background:
I have to travel a lot for my work as a petsitter, and it's hard to keep up with my hair maintenance.
My hunting dog is the most valuable thing I own because he is my best friend and a loyal companion.
I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills.
i sing in a punk band.
i like to ride my scooter.

content.text: Hey there! I'm doing well today. How about you?
Doing well, thanks for asking! What do you do for fun?
I like to sew, play music, and explore new places. What about you?
I like to sing in a punk band, play with my dog, and ride my scooter.
That's cool! I've never been in a punk band before. Do you have any upcoming shows?
Not right now, but we're planning one for next month. We'll keep you posted!
Awesome, I'd love to come. What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of original songs and covers of punk and ska songs.
Cool, I'm sure it'll be a lot of fun.
Thanks, I'm glad you think so!
What kind of dog do you have?
A golden retriever. He's the best dog ever!
Golden retrievers are so cute! I've always wanted one.
They're great dogs. They're so friendly and loving.
They sound like perfect pets.
They are! I'm so glad I have him.
I'm sure he's glad to have you too.
I think so! He always seems happy to see me.
Aww, that's so sweet.
Yeah, he's a great dog.
I'm sure he is.
Thanks
